Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI massively improves the ease and speed with which you can check for errors and gain confidence with the course content.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Teachers can be confronting, GenAI is not a person so not a problem

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: GenAI will often give you the answer it thinks you want to hear so you have to look for your own errors in your lines of inquiry
